original_text:
The eye that mocks a father
    and scorns to obey a mother
will be picked out by the ravens of the valley
    and eaten by the vultures.
korean_text: 아비를 조롱하며 어미 순종하기를 싫어하는 자의 눈은 골짜기의 까마귀에게 쪼이고 독수리 새끼에게 먹히리라

sentences.original_text: The eye that mocks a father
and scorns to obey a mother
will be picked out by the ravens of the valley
